channel.title: Dialouge
channel.description:
probably a nooby question but i've never had to do it before so
[code]case 175: talk("Legend has it if you dig in this garden,", "There's a whole nother world!", 2290); break;[/code]
how would i make this talk with npc 2290. cuz right now it doesn't work :P

item.title: Dialouge
item.dc:creator: @Mack_n_cheese Mack n cheese
item.description:
@Mack_n_cheese wrote:

[quote=“MajorPro, post:4, topic:391373”]erm…try this:

talk2("Legend has it if you dig in this garden,", "There's a whole nother world!", 2290);[/quote]yeah i have :\ still doesn’t work it gets an error

Read full topic

item.title: Dialouge
item.dc:creator: @Mack_n_cheese Mack n cheese
item.description:
@Mack_n_cheese wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:2, topic:391373”]Actionhandler under firstclicknpc (That actually looks like delta, i’m not to sure.)

EDIT: I read the dialogue, i’m curious as to what you’re trying to do. Is it a quest or something?[/quote]yeah it is delta :\ actionhandler = clickingmost though so it helped me on the right track, so thanks

and i’m just making it so if you dig in fally park you go into the front of brimahaven dungeon and i’m gonna fill the dungeon and stuff. too lazy to make quests

Read full topic
